title: 62L.07 SMALL EMPLOYER REQUIREMENTS.
text:
Health benefit plans must require that small employers offering a health benefit plan maintain information verifying the continuing eligibility of the employer, its employees, and their dependents, and provide the information to health carriers on a quarterly basis or as reasonably requested by the health carrier.
Health benefit plans must require that small employers offering a health benefit plan maintain written documentation indicating that each eligible employee was informed of the availability of coverage through the employer and of a waiver of coverage by the eligible employee. This documentation must be provided to the health carrier upon reasonable request.
